required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Healthy Body Healthy Souls: A Weight Loss Intervention Using Diabetes Prevention Program Lifestyle Intervention (DPP-LI) With Church Level Systems Change in the Marshallese Population
clinical_study.official_title: Healthy Body Healthy Souls: A Weight Loss Intervention Using Diabetes Prevention Program Lifestyle Intervention (DPP-LI) With Church Level Systems Change in the Marshallese Population

brief_summary.textblock: The study aim is to pilot test and compare the effectiveness of achieving weight loss between implementation of: 1) the Diabetes Prevention Program Lifestyle Intervention (DPP-LI) and 2) Healthy Bodies Healthy Souls (HBHS) intervention which includes the same DPP-LI with the additional enhancement of working with Marshallese churches to implement organizational/institutional level changes to support the individual behavioral intervention of the DPP-LI.

primary_outcome.description: Percentage of body weight loss by individual participants from the initial data collection event to the six month post-initiation data collection event.

arm_group.description: Participants in Diabetes Prevention Program Lifestyle Intervention (DPP-LI) with Healthy Bodies Healthy Souls (HBHS) intervention which includes the enhancement of working with Marshallese churches to implement organizational/institutional level changes to support the individual behavioral intervention of the DPP-LI.

Diabetes Prevention Program Lifestyle Intervention at Marshallese churches with a focus on individual change without the implementation of organizational/institutional level changes to support the individual behavioral intervention of the DPP-LI.

intervention.intervention_name: Diabetes Prevention Program Lifestyle Intervention (DPP-LI) with Healthy Bodies Healthy Souls (HBHS)
intervention.description: Diabetes Prevention Program Lifestyle Intervention (DPP-LI) with Healthy Bodies Healthy Souls (HBHS) intervention which includes DPP-LI with the additional enhancement of working with Marshallese churches to implement organizational/institutional level changes to support the individual behavioral intervention of the DPP-LI.

study_pop.textblock: Marshallese persons attending Marshallese churches in Arkansas, Kansas, Missouri, and/or Oklahoma. The recruitment goal is up to 18 participants per church for up to four churches for a total of up to 72 participants through the duration of the study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Self-reported Marshallese
2. 18 years of age or older
3. Have a body mass index (BMI) of â‰¥25 kg/m2
Exclusion Criteria:
1. A clinically significant medical condition likely to impact weight (cancer, HIV/AIDS, etc.)
2. Currently pregnant or breastfeeding an infant who is 6 months old or younger.
3. Have any condition that makes it unlikely that the participant will be able to follow the protocol, such as terminal illness, plans to move out of the area within 6 months, and inability to finish the intervention, etc.
